oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dr. Robert Cogswell and Dean Dixon pose with folk artists
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Dr. Robert Cogswell (far left) and Dean Dixon (far right )editor and photographer, respectively, of "Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies," pose with some of the artists profiled in the book and exhibit, 2010.

All photographs for the book and exhibit were taken by Nashville photographer Dean Dixon under a contract with the TAC. Editorial copy provided by Dr. Robert Cogswell, director of the TAC Folklife Program.
